subject: MEGAMay Sale 2022! Exclusive deals and your chance to win a share of $50,000!

full_threads.body:
William, Go in the draw to win cold hard cash when you refer your mates! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

View in browser

Hi William,


This year's MEGAMay Sale has begun! This month is all about mates rates, so gather all your friends, family, colleagues or anyone that can take advantage of the huge discounts across a range of our services.

Cash Giveaway

This MEGAMay month we are giving away $50,000 in cash! All you have to do is refer a friend to VentraIP. Each successful referral will go into the draw, with 5 successful referrals drawn at random to win a share of the $50,000. So you and your referred friend could win $5,000 each.
Learn how to refer!

Special Offers
But that's not all! Check out our MEGAMay deals below to save on
new services, renewals and upgrades this month only!

*Offers exclusively available during MEGAMay 2022 (01/05/2022 - 31/05/2022). Ts&Cs Apply.

How can I enter/make a referral?

  • Refer a friend - Retrieve your unique referral code within VIPControl to pass on to your referee.

  • Purchase eligible services with us - Have your referee use your referral link to make a Web Hosting and Domain Name purchase and/or transfer.

  • Get paid out in CASH - After 60 days of the referee holding a valid Web Hosting service and Domain Name with us, you'll receive $50.00 in your VentraIP Wallet.

  • Enter the running for our Cash Giveaway - After a successful referral, both the referrer and referee will enter the draw to win a share of the $50,000 cash prize.

  • Wait and see if you're are a lucky WINNER - The announcement of all winners will take place at 2:00 PM AEST on Monday, 1 August 2022 via our Facebook page.


​Any questions? Check out our MEGAMay blog post for more information.
If you'd like to reach out to us, feel free to submit an eTicket from within VIPControl.


Need Help? We're Here to Assist
Our Australian based staff are here for you 24/7
